verses.roman:
tāvat ihāṅ vasi' śuna nāma-saṅkīrtana
nāma pūrṇa haile, pūrṇa habe tomāra mana'

synonyms: tāvat—until that time; ihāṅ—here; vasi'-sitting; śuna—hear; nāma-saṅkīrtana—chanting of the holy name of the Lord; nāma pūrṇa haile—as soon as the regular chanting is fulfilled; pūrṇa—satisfied; habe—will be; tomāra mana—your mind.
translation: "Please sit down and hear the chanting of the Hare Kṛṣṇa mahā-mantra until my regular chanting is finished. Then your desire will surely be fulfilled."
